name: flickering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
shining with a light that is sometimes bright and sometimes weak: a flickering candle/fire flickering television screens
appearing for a short time before disappearing again: a flickering hope There were a few flickering signs of optimism. See
flicker
More examplesFewer examplesFlickering fluorescent lights have been shown to rob you of energy.a flickering videothe children's flickering attention spanlast season's flickering romance between the two film stars
